MALL CENTER.name: { ~ THE MALL ~ }
MALL CENTER.desc: You are a lost child in the MIDDLE of a mall with no clue where your mother could be... Go find her!

NORTH.name: Women's clothing section
NORTH.desc: You have entered the Women's clothing section and you immediately become overwhelmed as every women looks like your mother...

items.desc: You go to turn back but find your mom's COAT BUTTON at your feet...
items.take: You take the button and continue your search.

WEST.name: Men's clothing Section
WEST.desc: You have entered the Men's clothing section... Not many shoppers here it seems...

items.item: STALE AIR AND A SENSE OF SADNESS
items.desc: You survey the room briefly before catching onto the stench of STALE AIR AND A SENSE OF SADNESS...
items.take: You take in the moment to step away from your panic to take in the sadness before you before continuing your search.

EAST.name: A retail shoe store
EAST.desc: It's rather packed... I wonder if she could be in here?

SOUTH.name: Retail store
SOUTH.desc: A larger part of the MALL but has one of those overly done entry ways, huh.

items.take: You doubt she would enter that part of the mall anyways...

NORTHWEST.name: Toy store
NORTHWEST.desc: So many TOYS to choose from!

items.take: You hoped that she would be here since she did promise a toy if you were good at the mall, guess thats not happening now...

items.desc: You walk into the restroom and accidentally bump into a family friend who is offering you a TIP
items.take: A family friend mentioned that they saw mom near the retail store, maybe I should check it out!

SOUTHWEST.name: Vending machines
SOUTHWEST.desc: A gross area of the mall and you feel scared to approach this part of the mall, probably not a good idea...

items.desc: A mysterious figure is lurking and asks you to come CLOSER
items.take: Without hesitation the mysterious figure reaches out to you... You have been abducted!? (YOU LOSE)

SOUTHEAST.name: Perfume store
SOUTHEAST.desc: This store gives off a pleasant aroma that reminds you of mom

items.desc: Could it be MOM in the back of the store?
items.take: Phew! What a relief! I'm glad thats over with! (YOU WIN)
